title: MVNPDF — mvnpdf
MVNPDF — mvnpdf
code: mvnpdf(x, mean = rep(0, nrow(x)), varcovM = diag(nrow(x)), Log = TRUE)

title: MVNPDF — mvnpdf
text: x matrix, n columns (observations) p rows. mean vector means. varcovM variance-covariance matrix. Log logical parameter, default value TRUE.

title: MVNPDF — mvnpdf
text: Returns list containing matrix x, vector length n multivariate normal distribution density values points (eventually log-scale).

code: pdfvalues <- mvnpdf(x=matrix(seq(-3, 3, by = 0.1), nrow = 1), Log=FALSE) plot(pdfvalues) #> Error in xy.coords(x, y, xlabel, ylabel, log): 'x' and 'y' lengths differ
